mapper.insert: insert into person_info (person_id, person_name, city, county, school,wschool, person_class, phone, state, create_time, update_time) values (#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update person_info
person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wschool = #{wschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_class = #{personClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update person_info set person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wschool = #{wschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_class = #{personClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT c.city_id as cityId, c.city_name as cityName from city as c
